title:
Modify the information in an existing ROR record: 
Max Planck Institute for Security and Privacy https://ror.org/00bj0r217
body:
Summary of request: Modify the information in an existing ROR record

Update record:
Name of organization: Max Planck Institute for Security and Privacy
ROR ID: https://ror.org/00bj0r217
Which part of the record needs to be changed? Other names or name versions listed in the record, Organization type
Description of change: a) The name version listed is the German version and is not the official German translation, so please exchange

"MAX-PLANCK-INSTITUT FÜR CYBERSICHERHEIT UND SCHUTZ DER PRIVATSPHÄRE"

with

"MAX-PLANCK-INSTITUT FÜR SICHERHEIT UND PRIVATSPHÄRE"

Sources: https://www.mpi-sp.org/2874/Impressum
https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q96393535

b) The tag "EDUCATION" is misleading and does not match the tag "FACILITY" of virtually all other institutes within the parent organisation "Max Planck Society", please exchange

Tag "EDUCATION"

with

Tag "FACILITY"

Sources: https://ror.org/00e4bwe12
https://ror.org/04a8rd767
https://ror.org/02ks53214
https://ror.org/02h1nk258
and virtually all others listed under https://ror.org/01hhn8329


Thank you!

Update: replace.labels==Max-Planck-Institut für Sicherheit und Privatsphäre*German; replace.types==Facility;$
comments:
adambuttrick
08/03/2022, 15:53:49 | 08/03/2022, 15:53:49
comment_text: I can find no instances of affiliation usage using the prior German form, so this is fine to change. Type change also corresponds to related records in ROR.

Update record:

ROR ID: https://ror.org/006fvbd84
Which part of the record needs to be changed? Primary name, Organization website, Organization type
Description of change: The Delaware Museum of Natural History recently went through a renovation project where all the gallery spaces were re-imagined.  As part of this Museum Metamorphosis, our name changed to the Delaware Museum of Nature and Science.  On 27 May 2022, the IRS recognized the organization and our new name as a 501(c)(3) and provided our tax-exempt determination letter.  Our website was updated to www.delmns.org.
